details.title: Erratum [Dec 05 612-616]
details.abstract: Corrections to (6) in "A simple procedure for Bayesian estimation of the Weibull distribution" (vol. 54, pp. 612-616, Dec 05) are presented here.

references.title:
A simple procedure for Bayesian estimation
of the Weibull distribution

context.text: In [1], \$\Gamma(n_{0})\$ in the denominator of (6) should be replaced by \$\Gamma(n_{0}-x_{0})\$.
Thus, (6) in [1] should have appeared as where \$z=e^{-t\lambda}\$ and \$\lambda>0\$, and the respective expression for the expectation as.

links.abstract: Practical use of Bayesian estimation procedures is often associated with difficulties related to elicitation of prior information, and its formalization into the respective prior distribution. The two-parameter Weibull distribution is a particularly difficult case, because it requires a two-dimensional joint prior distribution of the Weibull parameters. The novelty of the procedure suggested here is that the prior information can be presented in the form of the interval assessment of the reliabi...

references.text: M. P. Kaminskiy, V. V. Krivtsov, "A simple procedure for Bayesian estimation of the Weibull distribution", IEEE Trans. Reliability, vol. 54, pp. 612-616, 2005.
